metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24265 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in tcpreplay tcpprep v4.3.3. There is a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in MemcmpInterceptorCommon() that can make tcpprep crash and cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
